languages.text: "Что же, Император велит своим верным чадам поддерживать друг друга. Этот скромный подарок — мое поздравление с тем, что ты выжил{mf||а} на арене".
"Well, the Emperor does want his loyal children to support each other. Consider this humble gift my congratulations for not dying in the arena."
languages.original_text: "Что же, Император велит своим верным чадам поддерживать друг друга. Этот скромный подарок — мое поздравление с тем, что ты выжил{mf||а} на арене".

traits.locale_text: "Well, the Emperor does want his loyal children to support each other. Consider this humble gift my congratulations for not dying in the arena."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “好吧，帝皇确实希望祂忠诚的孩子们能相互支持。收下这份卑微的礼物吧，就当是庆祝你从竞技场上活了下来。”
languages.original_text: "Well, the Emperor does want his loyal children to support each other. Consider this humble gift my congratulations for not dying in the arena."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，帝皇确实希望祂忠诚的孩子们能相互支持。收下这份卑微的礼物吧，就当是庆祝你从竞技场上活了下来。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「皇帝は忠実な子供たちが互いに支えあうことを望んでおられることですしね…アリーナで死ななかったことへの祝福として、ささやかな贈り物を授けましょう」
languages.original_text: "Well, the Emperor does want his loyal children to support each other. Consider this humble gift my congratulations for not dying in the arena."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝は忠実な子供たちが互いに支えあうことを望んでおられることですしね…アリーナで死ななかったことへの祝福として、ささやかな贈り物を授けましょう」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Bueno, el Emperador quiere que sus leales hijos se apoyen mutuamente. Considere este humilde regalo mi felicitación por haber sobrevivido a la arena».
languages.original_text: "Well, the Emperor does want his loyal children to support each other. Consider this humble gift my congratulations for not dying in the arena."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, el Emperador quiere que sus leales hijos se apoyen mutuamente. Considere este humilde regalo mi felicitación por haber sobrevivido a la arena».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "Well, the Emperor does want his loyal children to support each other. Consider this humble gift my congratulations for not dying in the arena."

languages.text: « Eh bien, l'Empereur encourage toujours ses enfants à se soutenir les uns les autres, alors veuillez accepter ce modeste présent pour vous féliciter d'avoir survécu à l'arène. »
languages.original_text: "Well, the Emperor does want his loyal children to support each other. Consider this humble gift my congratulations for not dying in the arena."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, l'Empereur encourage toujours ses enfants à se soutenir les uns les autres, alors veuillez accepter ce modeste présent pour vous féliciter d'avoir survécu à l'arène. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Nun, der Imperator will, dass seine loyalen Kinder einander unterstützen. Betrachtet dieses bescheidene Geschenk als meinen Glückwunsch dazu, dass Ihr in der Arena nicht gestorben seid."
languages.original_text: "Well, the Emperor does want his loyal children to support each other. Consider this humble gift my congratulations for not dying in the arena."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, der Imperator will, dass seine loyalen Kinder einander unterstützen. Betrachtet dieses bescheidene Geschenk als meinen Glückwunsch dazu, dass Ihr in der Arena nicht gestorben seid."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "İmparator, sadık çocuklarının birbirlerine destek olmasını öğütler. Arenadan sağ çıkışın şerefine bu mütevazı armağanı kabul eyle."
languages.original_text: "Well, the Emperor does want his loyal children to support each other. Consider this humble gift my congratulations for not dying in the arena."

traits.locale_text: "Eh, İmparator sadık çocuklarının birbirine destek olmasını öğütler. Bu mütevazı armağanı, arenada ölmemiş olmanın karşılığında bir tebrik olarak kabul et."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
